title: NOTE: -1
clause_text: NOTE: -1. MCGM shall convert all roads of width less than 9 m to 9 m and above as per site condition through MR&TP Act or MMC Act.

source_pdf.text_snippet: NOTE: -1. MCGM shall convert all roads of width less than 9 m to 9 m and above as per site condition through MR&TP Act or MMC Act.
